task_summary: Perceive the green garbage bin, approach and align to its lid, open the bin lid, verify it is open, and retreat.

task_long_description.overview: A mobile manipulator approaches a green garbage bin positioned beside a table. The objective is to lift and open the bin’s hinged lid using the end-effector. The behavior emphasizes reliable perception of the bin, precise alignment to the lid edge, and a safe opening motion, followed by verification and a retreat to avoid collisions. Timeouts and capped attempts bound the perception and opening actions to keep the routine robust under imperfect sensing.
preconditions: Robot base is positioned within reachable workspace of the bin
Green bin with a hinged lid is present in view or discoverable by scan
Scene is static enough to permit alignment
stepwise_plan: Check if the green bin is visible; otherwise perform an arc scan.
Detect and localize the green bin.
Move above the bin to a safe pre-grasp height.
Approach and align precisely to the lid edge/handle.
Execute the container opening routine for a bin lid.
Confirm the lid state is open.
success_criteria: The lid is observed to be open (hinge angle increased and ContainerOpen condition satisfied).
No collisions with the table, bin body, or environment.
Robot ends in a safe, re-usable pose.
failure_and_recovery: Bin not initially visible → perform ScanForTarget and retry detection.
Alignment drifts → re-run ApproachAndAlign from MoveAbove waypoint.
Lid resists opening → re-attempt OpenContainer after slight re-alignment.
Timeouts → abort and retreat to avoid lingering contact.
task_long_description.termination: Terminate when ContainerOpen is true and the Retreat completes without error.

frame_5.now_evidence: Clear actuation on the lid—gripper engaged and lid angle increasing.
frame_5.predicts_next: Further opening or transition to retreat is likely.

frame_4.now_evidence: Tight alignment to the lid edge prior to opening.
frame_4.predicts_next: OpenContainer likely to succeed from this pose.

frame_6.now_evidence: Lid appears more open; action continuation visible.

task_instruction: lift open green garbage can lid

node_specs.description: Checks if the green bin is currently visible.
Performs an arc scan to locate the bin if not visible.
Detect and localize the bin for downstream motion.
Move to a safe height above the bin.
Precisely align the TCP to the lid edge/handle.
Execute opening motion for a hinged bin lid.
Verify that the container (bin lid) is open.
Back off to a safe distance after opening.

failure_modes: Perception fails due to glare or low contrast
Lid hinge friction too high causing partial open
recovery_strategy: Re-scan and re-detect with capped attempts
Re-approach from MoveAbove waypoint to clear obstacles
Abort and Retreat if repeated timeouts
assumptions: The lid is hinged and opens upward as seen in frames.
OpenContainer implements a lifting motion suitable for a bin lid; no explicit handle grasp is required.
Robot base pose already provides reachable kinematics.

expected_success_criteria: ContainerOpen returns success and visual inspection shows lid angle increased
No contact with table or bin rim except at lid edge during opening
